name: Conjure Black Pudding
components: V, S, M (a flask of acid worth 10 gp)
text: You summon a black pudding that immediately attacks creatures near it. You have no control over the creature, and it may attack you if there are no more obvious opponents. The black pudding is treated as a summoned creature and has the extraplanar subtype. The black pudding’s split ability works normally, but all puddings derived from the summoned one disappear when the spell ends.
mythicText:
The black pudding has fast healing equal to your tier, as do any puddings that split off from it. The black puddings from this spell never attack you, though they’re otherwise uncontrolled and might attack your allies if there are no other obvious opponents.

Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the pudding gains the savage mythic template (see page 224). Puddings that split off from the giant pudding don’t gain the template.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (一瓶酸液，价值10gp)
effect_zh: 召唤一只黑布丁怪 (black pudding)
text_zh:
你召唤出一只黑布丁怪 (black pudding)，它会立刻开始攻击附近的生物。

你对它没有任何控制力，所以如果附近没有其他明显的对手，它有可能会攻击你。

这只黑布丁怪被视为一个召唤生物，同时拥有跨位面亚种。

黑布丁怪的分裂能力将会正常工作，但是在法术持续时间结束时所有衍生体都会一同消失。
mythicText_zh:
黑布丁怪获得等同于你的阶层点快速回复，由它所分裂出的黑布丁怪也同样获得该能力。来自该法术的黑布丁怪绝不会攻击你，不过它还是不受控制，而且如果没有其他明显敌人的时候，它还可能攻击你的盟友。

强化（6阶）：若你花费2次神话之力，黑布丁怪便能获得狂野（savage）神话模板。由它所分裂出的黑布丁怪不会获得此模板。
